scripts.docker-wi29-worker: docker build -t minaahmadi/ga-worker:wi29 -f Dockerfile-wi29-worker . && docker push minaahmadi/ga-worker:wi29
scripts.docker-pcb442-worker: docker build -t minaahmadi/ga-worker:pcb442 -f Dockerfile-pcb442-worker . && docker push minaahmadi/ga-worker:pcb442
scripts.docker-wi29-master: docker build -t minaahmadi/ga-master:wi29 -f Dockerfile-wi29-master . && docker push minaahmadi/ga-master:wi29
scripts.docker-pcb442-master: docker build -t minaahmadi/ga-master:pcb442 -f Dockerfile-pcb442-master . && docker push minaahmadi/ga-master:pcb442
scripts.docker-uy734-worker: docker build -t minaahmadi/ga-worker:uy734 -f Dockerfile-uy734-worker . && docker push minaahmadi/ga-worker:uy734
scripts.docker-uy734-master: docker build -t minaahmadi/ga-master:uy734 -f Dockerfile-uy734-master . && docker push minaahmadi/ga-master:uy734
scripts.docker-ch150-worker: docker build -t minaahmadi/ga-worker:ch150 -f Dockerfile-ch150-worker . && docker push minaahmadi/ga-worker:ch150
scripts.docker-ch150-master: docker build -t minaahmadi/ga-master:ch150 -f Dockerfile-ch150-master . && docker push minaahmadi/ga-master:ch150
scripts.docker: npm run docker-wi29-worker && npm run docker-ch150-worker && npm run docker-pcb442-worker && npm run docker-uy734-worker && npm run docker-wi29-master && npm run docker-ch150-master && npm run docker-pcb442-master && npm run docker-uy734-master
